TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CLSID extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 充当 COM 类的全局唯一标识符 (GUID) 的包装。

span.span: Serves as a wrapper for a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a COM class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLSID 结构包装 COM 类标识符 (CLSID) 结构，它可用作特定的 COM 类的唯一标识符。The CLSID structure wraps the COM class identifier (CLSID) structure, which serves as a unique identifier for a specific COM class. CLSID 是 GUID 是全局唯一标识符的缩写的同一方法中的类标识符的缩写。CLSID is an abbreviation for class identifier, in the same way that GUID is an abbreviation for globally unique identifier. 这两种缩写指的重复出现，以便它可以用作唯一标识符跨计算机和网络统计可能性低一个 128 位整数。Both abbreviations refer to a 128-bit integer with a low statistical likelihood of being duplicated so that it can be used as a unique identifier across computers and networks. 通常情况下，此标识符表示为字节数组 16 成员或特殊格式 （其中字符 a 到 f 或从 A 到 F 表示十进制数字 10-15） 的十六进制数字的字符串。Typically, this identifier is represented either as a 16-member array of bytes or as a specially formatted string of hexadecimal digits (where the characters a-f, or A-F, represent the decimal numbers 10-15). 此字符串表示形式包含任一 32 连续的十六进制数字或 8、 4、 4、 4 和 12 个十六进制数字，由连字符分隔的组。This string representation consists of either 32 contiguous hexadecimal digits or of groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 hexadecimal digits, separated by hyphens. （可选） 可以在圆括号或大括号中包含的连字符的字符串表示形式 ({})。The hyphenated string representation optionally can be enclosed in parentheses or braces ({}). 更多相关信息：For more information: - 有关其格式的唯一标识符，请参阅。About unique identifiers and their format, see . - 使用 CLSID 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 进行编程，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。Programming with the CLSID structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
